about_the_game:
TOXΔ is the name for the spirit in the land of the gods. In their zeal to build and maintain their country. The land that is situated on a high cloud is approaching the sky. This land of gods existed for centuries and was inhabited by gods who love peace.

Today, a beautiful witch has come to retrieve the supporting crystals for the land of the gods. We fought with enthusiasm, but we were defeated and fell to earth.

This incident overwhelmed us to face this witch. With enthusiasm we dare to show the fire of illusion. However, we lost and teleport to the island of the gods. The witch took the crystal ball that supported the land of the gods. They just disappear. And strangely the witch knows about me, but I don't know her.

After the fall of this land of the gods, I was confused and worried about what to do. There is a story about that witch and it turns out that she was influenced by the god of darkness which use" Mystical Cloning Powers". So, we know her as a good witch. Finally, we started training more vigorously and passionately to save those good crystals and magicians.

ToxΔ adapts cinematic action, adventure and unique genre. Equipped with magic, warfare, fireball, mystical particle, mythological creature, teleportation, forest, sci-fi city, desert, three seasons island, and parting seas. On the same Maps, there are 2 graphic modes, namely soft and natural.

To make prioritize comfort of playing games that way there have 2 modes. You can choose your colours and emotion mood.
1. Soft mode for soft colours and brightness.
2. Natural mode for natural colours brightness.

  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 @ 3.3GHz (4th Generation) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p / 60fps
